thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: More Devices Gain 3-D Vision

author: Jack Nicas
title: More Devices Gain 3-D Vision
text:
Faster, cheaper computer processors are enabling more devices to “see” in three dimensions, spawning drones that can avoid trees, robots that can skirt furniture and security cameras that can tell a homeowner from an intruder.
Many of the new devices combine images from two side-by-side cameras, simulating how humans see. Until recently, such an...
